metadataAttributes.Title: Decentralized Finance (DeFi): The Future of Finance Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Learn more about decentralized finance.. Understand the infrastructure of decentralized finance and assess opportunities in this space as well as screen out ideas that are likely to fail.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Cryptography, Smart Contract, Decentralized Protocols, governance, Blockchain Mechanics, Consensus mechanisms, digital signature, Address mechanics, Flash loans, Bonding curves, Set Protocol’s tokenization method, Mechanics of Compound and Aave,
